about_the_game:
Create a world that changes with the seasons with the Summerwind Saga - Grasslands 4 Seasons pack! ELV Games continues their Summerwind Saga series with a pile of tilesets that you can switch between to show time passing in your game! Cycle through spring, summer, fall, and winter while your hero gathers ingredients and explores their world, and create varied spaces with short cliffs and fences. 1 A2 and 17 B sheets off up different colors for grasses to best match the season you want. Each season has their own 4 B sheets filled with plants, stones, wooden signs, and more to help you make busy plains and forests.

Each tile comes in multiple sizes for Ace and MV/MZ so you can easily use them in your favorite engine. If you’ve been wanting to show different seasons as your player explores the world or want to have distinct plant colors for different areas, check out the Summerwind Saga - Grasslands 4 Seasons pack!


Contents:

- Grasslands tiles for your game!
- 4 seasons! (Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter)
- Multiple type of trees, plants, grass, stones, rocks and more
- Water tiles, deep water tiles and underwater objects
- Every tile position matches the other seasons tile positions for easy changing of the seasons


Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
